name: 黃秀英
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組、凸輪、齒輪、純滾動系統、鏈輪、皮帶、滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
The course will provide students the basic concepts and principles of mechanisms and dynamics of machinery.  The course will cover the Constraint Analysis, Graphical Analysis, Joints, Linkage Motions, Cam, Gear, Gear Train and several special mechanisms.
